---
title: "Interactive Line Plot"
format: html
execute:
  runtime: shiny
---


```{r}
library(shiny)
library(ggplot2)

ui <- fluidPage(
  sliderInput("m", "Slope (m):", min = -5, max = 5, value = 3, step = 0.1),
  sliderInput("b", "Intercept (b):", min = -20, max = 20, value = 10, step = 1),
  plotOutput("linePlot")
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  output$linePlot <- renderPlot({
    x <- seq(-10, 10, length.out = 100)
    y <- input$m * x + input$b
    df <- data.frame(x = x, y = y)

    ggplot(df, aes(x, y)) +
      geom_line(color = "#0072B2", size = 1.5) +
      labs(
        title = bquote(hat(y) == .(input$m) * x + .(input$b)),
        x = "x", y = expression(hat(y))
      ) +
      theme_minimal(base_size = 16)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```
